overview_example_one.yaml:
---
combine:
  type: combine
  refs: [ONE, TWO]
refs:
  ONE: [A, B, C]
  TWO: [1, 2, 3]

overview_example_two.yaml:
---
combine:
  type: combine
  refs: [ONE, TWO]
refs:
  ONE: [A, B, C]
  TWO: [1, 2, 3 ,4]

overview_example_three.yaml:
---
combine:
  type: combine
  refs: [ONE, TWO]
refs:
  ONE?sample=true: [A, B, C]
  TWO?sample=true: [1, 2, 3 ,4]

values_shorthand_one.yaml:
---
field1:
  type: vaules
  data: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
field2:
  type: values
  data:
    A: 0.5
    B: 0.3
    C: 0.2
field3:
  type: values
  data: CONSTANT

values_shorthand_two.yaml:
---
field1: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
field2:
  A: 0.5
  B: 0.3
  C: 0.2
field3: CONSTANT

config_example_one.yaml:
---
ONE:
  type: values
  config:
    prefix: TEST
    suffix: '@DEMO'
  data: [1, 2, 3]
TWO?prefix=TEST&suffix=@DEMO: [1, 2, 3]

common_config_example_one.yaml:
---
field:
  type: values
  config:
    prefix: 'Hello '
  data: [world, beautiful, destiny]

constants_example_one.yaml:
constant1:
  type: values
  data: 42
shorthand_constant: This is simulated data and should not be used for nefarious purposes

list_values_example_one.yaml:
---
list1:
  type: values
  data: [200, 202, 303, 400, 404, 500]
shorthand_list: [200, 202, 303, 400, 404, 500]
random_pet?sample=true: [dog, cat, bunny, pig, rhino, hedgehog]

sample_mode_example_one.yaml:
---
combine:
  type: combine
  refs:
  - ONE
  - TWO
refs:
  ONE?sample=true: [A, B, C]
  TWO?sample=true: [1, 2, 3]

combine_spec_example_one.yaml:
---
full name:
  type: combine
  refs:
  - first
  - last
  config:
    join_with: ' '
refs:
  first:
    type: values
    data: [zebra, hedgehog, llama, flamingo]
  last:
    type: values
    data: [jones, smith, williams]

combine_list_spec_example_one.yaml:
---
full name:
  type: combine-list
  refs: [
    [first, last],
    [first, middle, last],
    [first, middle_initial, last]
  ]
  config:
    join_with: ' '
refs:
  first: [zebra, hedgehog, llama, flamingo]
  last: [jones, smith, williams]
  middle: [cloud, sage, river]
  middle_initial:
    a: 0.3
    m: 0.3
    j: 0.1
    l: 0.1
    e: 0.1
    w: 0.1

range_spec_example_one.yaml:
---
range_shorthand1:range:
  data:
  - 0
  - 10
  - 0.5
range_shorthand2:range:
- 0
- 10
- 0.5
zero_to_ten:
  data:
  - 0
  - 10
  - 0.5
  type: range

rand_range_spec_example_one.yaml:
---
population:
  type: rand_range
  data: [100, 1000]
  config:
    cast_to: int
pop:rand_range?cast=f: [200.2, 1222.7, 2]

geo_point_spec_example_one.yaml:
---
egypt:
  type: geo.point
  config:
    bbox:
    - 31.33134
    - 22.03795
    - 34.19295
    - 25.00562
    precision: 3

ip_spec_example_one.yaml:
---
network:
  type: ipv4
  config:
    cidr: 2.22.222.0/16
network_shorthand:ip?cidr=2.22.222.0/16: {}
network_with_base:ip?base=192.168.0: {}

weighted_ref_example_one.yaml:
---
http_code:
  type: weightedref
  data:
    GOOD_CODES: 0.7
    BAD_CODES: 0.3
refs:
  BAD_CODES:
    '400': 0.5
    '403': 0.3
    '404': 0.1
    '500': 0.1
  GOOD_CODES:
    '200': 0.5
    '202': 0.3
    '203': 0.1
    '300': 0.1

select_list_example_one.yaml:
---
ingredients:
  config:
    join_with: ', '
    max: 4
    mean: 3
    min: 2
    stddev: 1
  data:
  - onions
  - mushrooms
  - garlic
  - bell peppers
  - spinach
  - potatoes
  - carrots
  type: select_list_subset

select_list_example_two.yaml:
---
ingredients:
  type: select_list_subset
  config:
    join_with: '", "'
    mean: 3
    stddev: 1
    min: 2
    max: 4
    quote: '"'
  data:
  - onions
  - mushrooms
  - garlic
  - bell peppers
  - spinach
  - potatoes
  - carrots

csv_spec_example_one.yaml:
---
cities:
  type: csv
  config:
    datafile: cities.csv
    delimiter: '~'
    sample: true

csv_spec_example_two.yaml:
---
status:
  type: csv
  config:
    configref: tabs_config
    column: 1
description:
  type: csv
  config:
    configref: tabs_config
    column: 2
# shorthand notation
status_type:csv?configref=tabs_config&column=3: { }
refs:
  tabs_config:
    type: configref
    config:
      datafile: tabs.csv
      delimiter: '\t'
      headers: true

csv_select_example_one.yaml:
---
placeholder:
  type: csv_select
  data:
    geonameid: 1
    name: 2
    latitude: 5
    longitude: 6
    country_code: 9
    population: 15
  config:
    datafile: allCountries.txt
    headers: no
    delimiter: "\t"

char_class_spec_example_two.yaml:
---
password:
  type: char_class
  data:
  - word
  - special
  - hex-lower
  - M4$p3c!@l$@uc3
  config:
    mean: 14
    stddev: 2
    min: 10
    max: 18
    exclude: ['''', '"']

unicode_range_example_one.yaml:
text:
  type: unicode_range
  data: ['3040', '309f']
  config:
    mean: 5
unicode_range_example_one.output:
そぬをく
が
としぶ
ぉけべ゙
ゃれげえ
っぴ
つざめよがぽ
えろぱづゖごそ぀べかっ
い゘
ぱまる
